short_summary: RFP for Business Consultants (Business Consulting / Change Management stream) with a proposed contract duration of 120 days.
description: Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement. This requirement is for a Defence AI Centre to provide strategic leadership, governance, and guidance to successfully transition Defence to a data-driven organization that manages data as an enterprise asset and uses it effectively for evidence-based decision-making. The estimated level of effort of the contract will be for 120 days.

full_summary:
**Title-Titre-English**: Request for Proposal: Task-Based Professional Services for DND/Digital Transformation Office (DTO) Requirement 2.3
**Title-Titre-French**: Demande de propositions: Besoin de services professionnels centrés sur les tâches pour MDN/Bureau de la transformation numérique (BTN)

**Reference-Numéro de reference**: PW-23-01020953
**Solicitation Number-Numéro de sollicitation**: W6952-23-090
**Publication Date-Date de publication**: 2023-01-12
**Tender Closing Date-Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres**: 2023-02-03 14:00:00 (Expired)
**Expected Contract Start Date-Dates de début du contrat prévue**: None
**Expected Contract End Date-Dates de fin du contrat prévue**: None

**Notice Type-Type d'avis-English**: Request for Proposal
**Notice Type-Type d'avis-French**: Demande de propositions

**Trade Agreements- Accords commerciaux-English**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
**Trade Agreements-Accords commerciaux-French**: Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée

**Regions of Opportunity-Régions offres-English**: National Capital Region (NCR)
**Regions of Opportunity- Régions offres-French**: Région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

**Contracting Entity Name-Direction contractante-Nom integrale**: Department of National Defence
**Contracting Entity Address- Adresse de la direction contractante**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2, Canada

**Brief Description-Bref de la description-English**: The Department of National Defence (DND) and the Digital Transformation Office (DTO) are seeking proposals for Task-Based Professional Services for:
- Intermediate level of expertise in Business Consulting / Change Management for the development of a Defence Artificial Intelligence (AI) Strategy.
- Junior level of expertise in Business Consulting for support with the implementation of the AI Strategy.

**Goods and Services Identification Number-Numéro d'identification des biens et services-Spanish:**
Goods and services identification number: R019BF
- Human Resource Services, Business Consulting/Change Management; Project Management Services

**File Number-Numéro de dossier**: W6952-23-090
**Contracting Authority-Autorité
